methods.name: web3_clientVersion
methods.desc: Returns the current client version.
methods.returns: `String` - The current client version

methods.name: web3_sha3
methods.desc: Returns Keccak-256 (*not* the standardized SHA3-256) of the given data.
params: `String` - the data to convert into a SHA3 hash
methods.returns: `DATA` - The SHA3 result of the given string.

methods.name: net_version
methods.desc: Returns the current network protocol version.
methods.returns: `String` - The current network protocol version

methods.name: net_listening
methods.desc: Returns `true` if client is actively listening for network connections.
methods.returns: `Boolean` - `true` when listening, otherwise `false`.

methods.name: net_peerCount
methods.desc: Returns number of peers currenly connected to the client.
methods.returns: `QUANTITY` - integer of the number of connected peers.

methods.name: eth_protocolVersion
methods.desc: Returns the current ethereum protocol version.
methods.returns: `String` - The current ethereum protocol version

methods.name: eth_syncing
methods.desc: Returns an object with data about the sync status or `false`.
methods.returns: `Object|Boolean`, An object with sync status data or `FALSE`, when not syncing:

methods.name: eth_coinbase
methods.desc: Returns the client coinbase address.
methods.returns: `DATA`, 20 bytes - the current coinbase address.

methods.name: eth_mining
methods.desc: Returns `true` if client is actively mining new blocks.
methods.returns: `Boolean` - returns `true` of the client is mining, otherwise `false`.

methods.name: eth_hashrate
methods.desc: Returns the number of hashes per second that the node is mining with.
methods.returns: `QUANTITY` - number of hashes per second.

methods.name: eth_gasPrice
methods.desc: Returns the current price per gas in wei.
methods.returns: `QUANTITY` - integer of the current gas price in wei.

methods.name: eth_accounts
methods.desc: Returns a list of addresses owned by client.
methods.returns: `Array of DATA`, 20 Bytes - addresses owned by the client.

methods.name: eth_blockNumber
methods.desc: Returns the number of most recent block.
methods.returns: `QUANTITY` - integer of the current block number the client is on.

methods.name: eth_getBalance
methods.desc: Returns the balance of the account of given address.
params: `DATA`, 20 Bytes - address to check for balance.
`QUANTITY|TAG` - integer block number, or the string `"latest"`, `"earliest"` or `"pending"`, see the [default block parameter](#the-default-block-parameter)
methods.returns: `QUANTITY` - integer of the current balance in wei.

methods.name: eth_getStorageAt
methods.desc: Returns the value from a storage position at a given address.
params: `QUANTITY` - integer of the position in the storage.
`QUANTITY|TAG` - integer block number, or the string `"latest"`, `"earliest"` or `"pending"`, see the [default block parameter](#the-default-block-parameter)
methods.returns: `DATA` - the value at this storage position.

methods.name: eth_getTransactionCount
methods.desc: Returns the number of transactions *sent* from an address.
params: `QUANTITY|TAG` - integer block number, or the string `"latest"`, `"earliest"` or `"pending"`, see the [default block parameter](#the-default-block-parameter)
methods.returns: `QUANTITY` - integer of the number of transactions send from this address.

methods.name: eth_getBlockTransactionCountByHash
methods.desc: Returns the number of transactions in a block from a block matching the given block hash.
methods.returns: `QUANTITY` - integer of the number of transactions in this block.

methods.name: eth_getBlockTransactionCountByNumber
methods.desc: Returns the number of transactions in a block from a block matching the given block number.
params: `QUANTITY|TAG` - integer of a block number, or the string `"earliest"`, `"latest"` or `"pending"`, as in the [default block parameter](#the-default-block-parameter).
methods.returns: `QUANTITY` - integer of the number of transactions in this block.

methods.name: eth_getUncleCountByBlockHash
methods.desc: Returns the number of uncles in a block from a block matching the given block hash.
methods.returns: `QUANTITY` - integer of the number of uncles in this block.

methods.name: eth_getUncleCountByBlockNumber
methods.desc: Returns the number of uncles in a block from a block matching the given block number.
params: `QUANTITY` - integer of a block number, or the string "latest", "earliest" or "pending", see the [default block parameter](#the-default-block-parameter)
methods.returns: `QUANTITY` - integer of the number of uncles in this block.

methods.name: eth_getCode
methods.desc: Returns code at a given address.
params: `QUANTITY|TAG` - integer block number, or the string `"latest"`, `"earliest"` or `"pending"`, see the [default block parameter](#the-default-block-parameter)
methods.returns: `DATA` - the code from the given address.

methods.name: eth_sign
methods.desc:
Signs data with a given address.
**Note** the address to sign must be unlocked.
methods.returns: `DATA`: Signed data

methods.name: eth_sendTransaction
methods.desc: Creates new message call transaction or a contract creation, if the data field contains code.
methods.returns: `DATA`, 32 Bytes - the transaction hash, or the zero hash if the transaction is not yet available.

methods.name: eth_sendRawTransaction
methods.desc: Creates new message call transaction or a contract creation for signed transactions.
methods.returns: `DATA`, 32 Bytes - the transaction hash, or the zero hash if the transaction is not yet available.

methods.name: eth_call
methods.desc: Executes a new message call immediately without creating a transaction on the block chain.
params: `QUANTITY|TAG` - integer block number, or the string `"latest"`, `"earliest"` or `"pending"`, see the [default block parameter](#the-default-block-parameter)
methods.returns: `DATA` - the return value of executed contract.

methods.name: eth_estimateGas
methods.desc: Makes a call or transaction, which won't be added to the blockchain and returns the used gas, which can be used for estimating the used gas.
methods.returns: `QUANTITY` - the amount of gas used.

methods.name: eth_getBlockByHash
methods.desc: Returns information about a block by hash.
params: `Boolean` - If `true` it returns the full transaction objects, if `false` only the hashes of the transactions.
methods.returns: `Object` - A block object, or `null` when no block was found:

methods.name: eth_getBlockByNumber
methods.desc: Returns information about a block by block number.
params: `QUANTITY|TAG` - integer of a block number, or the string `"earliest"`, `"latest"` or `"pending"`, as in the [default block parameter](#the-default-block-parameter).
`Boolean` - If `true` it returns the full transaction objects, if `false` only the hashes of the transactions.
methods.returns: See [eth_getBlockByHash](#eth_getblockbyhash)

methods.name: eth_getTransactionByHash
methods.desc: Returns the information about a transaction requested by transaction hash.
methods.returns: `Object` - A transaction object, or `null` when no transaction was found:

methods.name: eth_getTransactionByBlockHashAndIndex
methods.desc: Returns information about a transaction by block hash and transaction index position.
params: `QUANTITY` - integer of the transaction index position.
methods.returns: See [eth_getBlockByHash](#eth_gettransactionbyhash)

methods.name: eth_getTransactionByBlockNumberAndIndex
methods.desc: Returns information about a transaction by block number and transaction index position.
params: `QUANTITY|TAG` - a block number, or the string `"earliest"`, `"latest"` or `"pending"`, as in the [default block parameter](#the-default-block-parameter).
methods.returns: See [eth_getBlockByHash](#eth_gettransactionbyhash)

methods.name: eth_getTransactionReceipt
methods.desc:
Returns the receipt of a transaction by transaction hash.
**Note** That the receipt is not available for pending transactions.
methods.returns: `Object` - A transaction receipt object, or `null` when no receipt was found:

methods.name: eth_getUncleByBlockHashAndIndex
methods.desc: Returns information about a uncle of a block by hash and uncle index position.
methods.returns: See [eth_getBlockByHash](#eth_getblockbyhash)

methods.name: eth_getUncleByBlockNumberAndIndex
methods.desc: Returns information about a uncle of a block by number and uncle index position.
params: `QUANTITY|TAG` - a block number, or the string `"earliest"`, `"latest"` or `"pending"`, as in the [default block parameter](#the-default-block-parameter).
methods.returns: See [eth_getBlockByHash](#eth_getblockbyhash)

methods.name: eth_getCompilers
methods.desc: Returns a list of available compilers in the client.
methods.returns: `Array` - Array of available compilers.

methods.name: eth_compileSolidity
methods.desc: Returns compiled solidity code.
methods.returns: `DATA` - The compiled source code.

methods.name: eth_compileLLL
methods.desc: Returns compiled LLL code.
methods.returns: `DATA` - The compiled source code.

methods.name: eth_compileSerpent
methods.desc: Returns compiled serpent code.
methods.returns: `DATA` - The compiled source code.

methods.name: eth_newFilter
methods.desc:
Creates a filter object, based on filter options, to notify when the state changes (logs).
To check if the state has changed, call [eth_getFilterChanges](#eth_getfilterchanges).
methods.returns: 1. `Object` - The filter options:

methods.name: eth_newBlockFilter
methods.desc:
Creates a filter in the node, to notify when a new block arrives.
To check if the state has changed, call [eth_getFilterChanges](#eth_getfilterchanges).
methods.returns: `QUANTITY` - A filter id.

methods.name: eth_newPendingTransactionFilter
methods.desc:
Creates a filter in the node, to notify when new pending transactions arrive.
To check if the state has changed, call [eth_getFilterChanges](#eth_getfilterchanges).
methods.returns: `QUANTITY` - A filter id.

methods.name: eth_uninstallFilter
methods.desc:
Uninstalls a filter with given id. Should always be called when watch is no longer needed.
Additonally Filters timeout when they aren't requested with [eth_getFilterChanges](#eth_getfilterchanges) for a period of time.
methods.returns: `Boolean` - `true` if the filter was successfully uninstalled, otherwise `false`.

methods.name: eth_getFilterChanges
methods.desc: Polling method for a filter, which returns an array of logs which occurred since last poll.
methods.returns: `Array` - Array of log objects, or an empty array if nothing has changed since last poll.

methods.name: eth_getFilterLogs
methods.desc: Returns an array of all logs matching filter with given id.
methods.returns: See [eth_getFilterChanges](#eth_getfilterchanges)

methods.name: eth_getLogs
methods.desc: Returns an array of all logs matching a given filter object.
methods.returns: See [eth_getFilterChanges](#eth_getfilterchanges)

methods.name: eth_getWork
methods.desc: Returns the hash of the current block, the seedHash, and the boundary condition to be met ("target").
methods.returns: `Array` - Array with the following properties:

methods.name: eth_submitWork
methods.desc: Used for submitting a proof-of-work solution.
methods.returns: `Boolean` - returns `true` if the provided solution is valid, otherwise `false`.

methods.name: eth_submitHashrate
methods.desc: Used for submitting mining hashrate.
params: `Hashrate`, a hexadecimal string representation (32 bytes) of the hash rate
`ID`, String - A random hexadecimal(32 bytes) ID identifying the client
methods.returns: `Boolean` - returns `true` if submitting went through succesfully and `false` otherwise.

methods.name: db_putString
methods.desc:
Stores a string in the local database.
**Note** this function is deprecated and will be removed in the future.
methods.returns: `Boolean` - returns `true` if the value was stored, otherwise `false`.

methods.name: db_getString
methods.desc:
Returns string from the local database.
**Note** this function is deprecated and will be removed in the future.
methods.returns: `String` - The previously stored string.

methods.name: db_putHex
methods.desc:
Stores binary data in the local database.
**Note** this function is deprecated and will be removed in the future.
methods.returns: `Boolean` - returns `true` if the value was stored, otherwise `false`.

methods.name: db_getHex
methods.desc:
Returns binary data from the local database.
**Note** this function is deprecated and will be removed in the future.
methods.returns: `DATA` - The previously stored data.

methods.name: shh_version
methods.desc: Returns the current whisper protocol version.
methods.returns: `String` - The current whisper protocol version

methods.name: shh_post
methods.desc: Sends a whisper message.
methods.returns: `Boolean` - returns `true` if the message was send, otherwise `false`.

methods.name: shh_newIdentity
methods.desc: Creates new whisper identity in the client.
methods.returns: `DATA`, 60 Bytes - the address of the new identiy.

methods.name: shh_hasIdentity
methods.desc: Checks if the client hold the private keys for a given identity.
params: `DATA`, 60 Bytes - The identity address to check.
methods.returns: `Boolean` - returns `true` if the client holds the privatekey for that identity, otherwise `false`.

methods.name: shh_newGroup
methods.returns: `DATA`, 60 Bytes - the address of the new group. (?)

methods.name: shh_addToGroup
params: `DATA`, 60 Bytes - The identity address to add to a group (?).
methods.returns: `Boolean` - returns `true` if the identity was successfully added to the group, otherwise `false` (?).

methods.name: shh_newFilter
methods.desc: Creates filter to notify, when client receives whisper message matching the filter options.
methods.returns: `QUANTITY` - The newly created filter.

methods.name: shh_uninstallFilter
methods.desc:
Uninstalls a filter with given id. Should always be called when watch is no longer needed.
Additonally Filters timeout when they aren't requested with [shh_getFilterChanges](#shh_getfilterchanges) for a period of time.
methods.returns: `Boolean` - `true` if the filter was successfully uninstalled, otherwise `false`.

methods.name: shh_getFilterChanges
methods.desc:
Polling method for whisper filters. Returns new messages since the last call of this method.
**Note** calling the [shh_getMessages](#shh_getmessages) method, will reset the buffer for this method, so that you won't receive duplicate messages.
methods.returns: `Array` - Array of messages received since last poll:

methods.name: shh_getMessages
methods.desc: Get all messages matching a filter. Unlike `shh_getFilterChanges` this returns all messages.
methods.returns: See [shh_getFilterChanges](#shh_getfilterchanges)

methods.name: personal_newAccount
methods.desc: Creates new account

methods.name: ethcore_minGasPrice
methods.desc: Returns currently set minimal gas price
methods.returns: `QUANTITY` - Minimal Gas Price

methods.name: ethcore_extraData
methods.desc: Returns currently set extra data
methods.returns: `DATA` - Extra data

methods.name: ethcore_setExtraData
methods.desc: Changes extra data for newly mined blocks

methods.name: ethcore_setMinGasPrice
methods.desc: Changes minimal gas price for transaction to be accepted to the queue.

methods.name: ethcore_gasFloorTarget
methods.desc: Returns current target for gas floor

methods.name: ethcore_setGasFloorTarget
methods.desc: Changes current gas floor target.

methods.name: ethcore_setAuthor
methods.desc: Changes author (coinbase) for mined blocks.

methods.name: ethcore_setTransactionsLimit
methods.desc: Changes limit for transactions in queue.

methods.name: ethcore_transactionsLimit
methods.desc: Changes limit for transactions in queue.
methods.returns: `QUANTITY` - Current max number of transactions in queue.

methods.name: ethcore_netChain
methods.desc: Returns the name of the connected chain.
methods.returns: `DATA` - chain name

methods.name: ethcore_netMaxPeers
methods.desc: Returns maximal number of peers.
methods.returns: `QUANTITY` - Maximal number of peers

methods.name: ethcore_netPort
methods.desc: Returns network port the node is listening on.
methods.returns: `QUANTITY` - Port Number

methods.name: ethcore_rpcSettings
methods.desc: Returns basic settings of rpc (enabled, port, interface).
methods.returns: `OBJECT` - JSON object containing rpc settings

methods.name: ethcore_nodeName
methods.desc: Returns node name (identity)
methods.returns: `DATA` - Node name
